title: all_advanscene_xxxx_kiosk_demo_nds_roms_files_plus_current_19xx_
description:
Here are all the hard-to-find xxxx releases (Kiosk, Demo, Hardware, etc NDS ROM file dumps) recognized in the current ADVANsCEne DAT with NDSCRC (Feb. 4, 2008). I&#039;ve gone ahead and thrown in 1900-1990 because there is no set available with these yet and this is all that is required for a complete set if you already have 0001-1800.

Once again, if you have 0001-1800, this is all you need for a complete set as of this date. The xxxx ROMs were very difficult to find, so please seed them as long as possible.

PLEASE use a selective client like Ãƒâ€šÃ‚ÂµTorrent to increase the priority of the xxxx files and download/seed those ASAP because I will not be able to seed for long. The 19xx files are easily available one-by-one elsewhere, so those are only for one-stop convenience. If I can, I will try to double-seed to get them out there in the next few days. My upload speed will be slow at first.
